features.name: User Authentication
features.description: Allow users to securely log in and manage their session.

tasks.title: Implement Login API Route
tasks.description: Create a POST /api/login route to authenticate users using email and password.
tasks.technicalNotes: Use Next.js Route Handlers in app/api; validate credentials against in-memory User store; hash comparison using bcrypt or similar.

tasks.title: Build LoginForm Component
tasks.description: Develop a reusable login form for user input and submission.
tasks.technicalNotes: TypeScript + Tailwind CSS; handle form state and validation; submit to /api/login.

tasks.title: Session Management with Context API
tasks.description: Manage user authentication state globally.
tasks.technicalNotes: Create AuthContext; store user info and login status; provide login/logout methods.

tasks.title: Protect Routes
tasks.description: Restrict access to certain pages for authenticated users only.
tasks.technicalNotes: Implement client-side route guards using Context API; optionally, add server-side checks in route handlers.

features.name: User Management API
features.description: CRUD operations for User entity via API endpoints.

tasks.title: Create /api/users Route Handler
tasks.description: Support GET (list users) and POST (create user) methods.
tasks.technicalNotes: Implement in app/api/users/route.ts; validate input; hash password on creation.

tasks.title: Create /api/users/[id] Route Handler
tasks.description: Support GET (fetch user), PUT (update), DELETE (remove).
tasks.technicalNotes: Implement in app/api/users/[id]/route.ts; handle user lookup by id; update in-memory store.

features.name: Insight Management API
features.description: CRUD operations for Insight entity via API endpoints.

tasks.title: Create /api/insights Route Handler
tasks.description: Support GET (list insights) and POST (create insight) methods.
tasks.technicalNotes: Implement in app/api/insights/route.ts; validate input; add createdAt timestamp.

tasks.title: Create /api/insights/[id] Route Handler
tasks.description: Support GET (fetch insight), PUT (update), DELETE (remove).
tasks.technicalNotes: Implement in app/api/insights/[id]/route.ts; handle insight lookup by id; update in-memory store.

features.name: Home Page
features.description: Landing page providing an overview of the application.

tasks.title: Develop Home Page UI
tasks.description: Build app/page.tsx with introductory content and navigation.
tasks.technicalNotes: Use Tailwind CSS and shadcn/ui for styling; import Header component.

features.name: Insights List Page
features.description: Display a list of AI-generated insights.

tasks.title: Fetch Insights from API
tasks.description: Retrieve insights via GET /api/insights and display them.
tasks.technicalNotes: Use server-side data fetching in app/insights/page.tsx; handle loading and error states.

tasks.title: Render InsightCard Components
tasks.description: Map over insights and render an InsightCard for each.
tasks.technicalNotes: Pass insight props to InsightCard; use Tailwind CSS for layout.

features.name: Insight Detail Page
features.description: Show detailed information for a specific insight.

tasks.title: Fetch Single Insight from API
tasks.description: Retrieve insight by id via GET /api/insights/[id].
tasks.technicalNotes: Use server-side data fetching in app/insights/[id]/page.tsx; handle not found and error states.

tasks.title: Render InsightDetail Component
tasks.description: Display all fields of the insight in a detailed view.
tasks.technicalNotes: Pass insight data as props; style with Tailwind CSS and shadcn/ui.

features.name: Header Component
features.description: Consistent navigation and branding across the app.

tasks.title: Develop Header UI
tasks.description: Create Header.tsx with navigation links and branding.
tasks.technicalNotes: Use Tailwind CSS; conditionally render login/logout based on auth state.

tasks.title: Integrate Header in Layout
tasks.description: Add Header to app/layout.tsx for global use.
tasks.technicalNotes: Ensure layout consistency across all pages.

features.name: Styling and UI Consistency
features.description: Ensure a modern, accessible, and consistent UI.

tasks.title: Configure Tailwind CSS
tasks.description: Set up Tailwind CSS with custom theme if needed.
tasks.technicalNotes: Edit tailwind.config.js; ensure shadcn/ui compatibility.

tasks.title: Integrate shadcn/ui Components
tasks.description: Use shadcn/ui for common UI elements (buttons, inputs, etc).
tasks.technicalNotes: Follow shadcn/ui documentation; ensure accessibility.

features.name: State Management
features.description: Global state for user session and possibly insights.

tasks.title: Implement React Context for Auth
tasks.description: Provide AuthContext to manage user session globally.
tasks.technicalNotes: Create context/provider; expose login/logout; wrap app in provider.

tasks.title: Optional: Insights Context
tasks.description: Manage insights state globally if required for performance or UX.
tasks.technicalNotes: Create InsightsContext; provide list and detail state; sync with API.

features.name: In-Memory Data Layer
features.description: Temporary data persistence for users and insights.

tasks.title: Implement In-Memory Store
tasks.description: Create simple JS objects/arrays to hold User and Insight data.
tasks.technicalNotes: Store in module scope; ensure thread safety for dev/test; reset on server restart.

tasks.title: Data Validation
tasks.description: Validate input data for API endpoints.
tasks.technicalNotes: Use Zod or custom validation; return appropriate error responses.

features.name: Testing & Quality Assurance
features.description: Ensure all core features work as expected.

tasks.title: Write Unit Tests for API Routes
tasks.description: Test user and insight API endpoints.
tasks.technicalNotes: Use Jest or similar; mock in-memory data layer.

tasks.title: Component Testing
tasks.description: Test UI components for correct rendering and interaction.
tasks.technicalNotes: Use React Testing Library; focus on LoginForm, InsightCard, InsightDetail.
